abstract: The recommendation by the United States Preventive Services Task Force now aligns it with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
snippet: The recommendation by the United States Preventive Services Task Force now aligns it with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
lead_paragraph: An influential health advisory group has reversed itself and concluded that all baby boomers should be tested for hepatitis C, meaning that under the new health law many insurance plans will have to provide screening without charge to patients.

headline.main: Hepatitis C Test for Baby Boomers Urged by Health Panel
headline.print_headline: Hepatitis C Test for Baby Boomers Urged by Health Panel
